pack_id.description: For standard stickers, ID of the pack the sticker is from

tags.description: For guild stickers, the Discord name of a unicode emoji representing the sticker's expression. for standard stickers, a comma-separated list of related expressions.

asset.description: Previously the sticker asset hash, now an empty string

available.description: Whether this guild sticker can be used, may be false due to loss of Server Boosts

guild_id.description: ID of the guild that owns this sticker

user.description: The user that uploaded the guild sticker

sort_value.description: The standard sticker's sort order within its pack

APISticker.deprecated: API and gateway v8 are deprecated and the types will not receive further updates, please update to v10.

StickerType.deprecated: API and gateway v8 are deprecated and the types will not receive further updates, please update to v10.

StickerFormatType.deprecated: API and gateway v8 are deprecated and the types will not receive further updates, please update to v10.

username.description: The user's username, not unique across the platform

bot.description: Whether the user belongs to an OAuth2 application

system.description: Whether the user is an Official Discord System user (part of the urgent message system)

mfa_enabled.description: Whether the user has two factor enabled on their account

accent_color.description: The user's banner color encoded as an integer representation of hexadecimal color code

verified.description: Whether the email on this account has been verified

flags.description:
The flags on a user's account

See https://discord.com/developers/docs/resources/user#user-object-user-flags

premium_type.description:
The type of Nitro subscription on a user's account

See https://discord.com/developers/docs/resources/user#user-object-premium-types

public_flags.description:
The public flags on a user's account

See https://discord.com/developers/docs/resources/user#user-object-user-flags

APIUser.deprecated: API and gateway v8 are deprecated and the types will not receive further updates, please update to v10.

UserFlags.deprecated: API and gateway v8 are deprecated and the types will not receive further updates, please update to v10.

UserPremiumType.deprecated: API and gateway v8 are deprecated and the types will not receive further updates, please update to v10.

APIStickerItem.deprecated: API and gateway v8 are deprecated and the types will not receive further updates, please update to v10.

cover_sticker_id.description: ID of a sticker in the pack which is shown as the pack's icon

banner_asset_id.description: ID of the sticker pack's banner image

APIStickerPack.deprecated: API and gateway v8 are deprecated and the types will not receive further updates, please update to v10.
